description: Core-0 → Pure capture profile tuned for human-rotation. Wider pairing window and soft nudge-export for better continuity between RAW and Awareness. | v0.5 adds GH/H temporal-presence research memory (no control/semantics).

changes: Enabled export of single flanks as stability_hint='nudge'
change_log.rationale: Previous profile yielded only ~3 PureSteps per rotation; this version restores continuity and proprioceptive density while maintaining clean gating.

changes: Added observations memory block S02.Observability.GH.v0.1 (G1–G4 + H v0.1)
Recorded CORE temporal presence capability (PRESENCE_START/END/HEARTBEAT) and read-only dashboard existence
No changes to capture params or quality gates
change_log.rationale: Promote the latest validated observability trajectory into X-RAM as flash memory, while keeping semantics and control strictly unchanged.

observations.summary: G1–G4 executed with strict discipline; H v0.1 added CORE temporal presence (PRESENCE_START/END/HEARTBEAT) enabling post-hoc episode reconstruction; live read-only dashboard added. No control or semantic changes.
capabilities: Read-only terminal dashboard for live human observation (logging remains canonical)
constraints: no control implications or mapping to Action Intent
additive logging only; do not break existing tools
key_facts: G2: Frame A showed overlap only when using ALL-signals; CORE overlap visible post-hoc (Frame B).
G4: 13 episodes reconstructed across 4 runs, grouped into 5 technical configurations (no semantics).
ORIGIN_CANDIDATE presence appeared in 3/4 logs; ORIGIN_COMMIT absent in that dataset.
